subject: Football
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Fitzpatrick, who has a torn ligament in his left thumb, and Geno Smith, who has a bruised left shoulder, were able to practice on Wednesday and did not appear restricted.
snippet: Fitzpatrick, who has a torn ligament in his left thumb, and Geno Smith, who has a bruised left shoulder, were able to practice on Wednesday and did not appear restricted.
